post.text: Working together we will MAKE AMERICA SAFE AND GREAT AGAIN! #LawAndOrder #ImWithYou

comment.author: Kyle
comment.text: We need you and your people in Louisiana now! Think about it. If you care, help them by sending help. They need it so badly. Hilllary is not helping and we don't see your people reaching out. Where should you be focusing your attention right now? Just asking....

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: I have and will be praying for the people of Louisiana. Y'all have such a beautiful state and good hardworking people. I have never experienced such a tragic circumstance but the people of Louisiana are in my Prayers.

replies.author: Spencer
replies.text: We are praying for you all! Where are you Obama and Hillary?? They need help RIGHT NOW!!
